languages.text: "Ранами Императора, говоришь? То есть, если вдруг мы знаем, что ты нам лжешь, ты уже не просто преступник, но еще и богохульник? А знаешь, что положено за хулу на Него?"

"On the Emperor's wounds, you say? So if we happened to know that you're lying to us, that would make you not just a criminal, but a blasphemer too? And do you know of the punishment for blaspheming against Him?"
languages.original_text: "Ранами Императора, говоришь? То есть, если вдруг мы знаем, что ты нам лжешь, ты уже не просто преступник, но еще и богохульник? А знаешь, что положено за хулу на Него?"

traits.locale_text: "On the Emperor's wounds, you say? So if we happened to know that you're lying to us, that would make you not just a criminal, but a blasphemer too? And do you know of the punishment for blaspheming against Him?"

"On the Emperor's wounds, you say? So if we happened to know that you're lying to us, that would make you not just a criminal, but a blasphemer too? And do you know of the punishment for blaspheming against Him?"

"On the Emperor's wounds, you say? So if we happened to know that you're lying to us, that would make you not just a criminal, but a blasphemer too? And do you know of the punishment for blaspheming against Him?"

"On the Emperor's wounds, you say? So if we happened to know that you're lying to us, that would make you not just a criminal, but a blasphemer too? And do you know of the punishment for blaspheming against Him?"

"On the Emperor's wounds, you say? So if we happened to know that you're lying to us, that would make you not just a criminal, but a blasphemer too? And do you know of the punishment for blaspheming against Him?"

languages.text: “你说，你以帝皇的伤口发誓？如果我们碰巧发现你在撒谎，那你将不仅仅是个罪犯，还是个亵渎者，你明白的吧？你知道亵渎祂的行为会招致怎样的惩罚吗？”
languages.original_text: "On the Emperor's wounds, you say? So if we happened to know that you're lying to us, that would make you not just a criminal, but a blasphemer too? And do you know of the punishment for blaspheming against Him?"

traits.locale_text: “你说，你以帝皇的伤口发誓？如果我们碰巧发现你在撒谎，那你将不仅仅是个罪犯，还是个亵渎者，你明白的吧？你知道亵渎祂的行为会招致怎样的惩罚吗？”

languages.text: «¿Con que por las heridas del Emperador? Entonces ¿si demostrásemos que nos estás mintiendo, no solo serías un criminal, sino también un blasfemo? ¿Y sabes acaso cuál es la pena por blasfemar contra Él?».
languages.original_text: "On the Emperor's wounds, you say? So if we happened to know that you're lying to us, that would make you not just a criminal, but a blasphemer too? And do you know of the punishment for blaspheming against Him?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Con que por las heridas del Emperador? Entonces ¿si demostrásemos que nos estás mintiendo, no solo serías un criminal, sino también un blasfemo? ¿Y sabes acaso cuál es la pena por blasfemar contra Él?».

languages.text: 「皇帝の傷だと？つまり嘘をついていると分かれば、貴様は犯罪者の上に冒涜者になるということだが？貴様、神の冒涜に対する罰は知っての発言か？」
languages.original_text: "On the Emperor's wounds, you say? So if we happened to know that you're lying to us, that would make you not just a criminal, but a blasphemer too? And do you know of the punishment for blaspheming against Him?"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝の傷だと？つまり嘘をついていると分かれば、貴様は犯罪者の上に冒涜者になるということだが？貴様、神の冒涜に対する罰は知っての発言か？」

languages.text: "Bei den Wunden des Imperators, sagt Ihr? Und wenn wir nun wüssten, dass Ihr uns belügt, wärt Ihr nicht nur kriminell, sondern auch gotteslästerlich, richtig? Und kennt Ihr die Strafe für Blasphemie gegen Ihn?"
languages.original_text: "On the Emperor's wounds, you say? So if we happened to know that you're lying to us, that would make you not just a criminal, but a blasphemer too? And do you know of the punishment for blaspheming against Him?"

traits.locale_text: "Bei den Wunden des Imperators, sagt Ihr? Und wenn wir nun wüssten, dass Ihr uns belügt, wärt Ihr nicht nur kriminell, sondern auch gotteslästerlich, richtig? Und kennt Ihr die Strafe für Blasphemie gegen Ihn?"

languages.text: « Sur les plaies de l'Empereur, vous dites ? Donc si on peut affirmer avec certitude que vous nous mentez, ça ferait de vous non seulement un criminel, mais aussi un blasphémateur ? Et vous savez quel châtiment vous encourez en cas de blasphème ? »
languages.original_text: "On the Emperor's wounds, you say? So if we happened to know that you're lying to us, that would make you not just a criminal, but a blasphemer too? And do you know of the punishment for blaspheming against Him?"

traits.locale_text: « Sur les plaies de l'Empereur, vous dites ? Donc si on peut affirmer avec certitude que vous nous mentez, ça ferait de vous non seulement un criminel, mais aussi un blasphémateur ? Et vous savez quel châtiment vous encourez en cas de blasphème ? »

languages.text: "İmparator'un yaralarına mı? O hâlde bize yalan söylediğinizi biliyor olsak bu sizi hem suçlu hem de günahkâr yapmaz mı? Günahkârlığın cezasını bilir misiniz?"
languages.original_text: "On the Emperor's wounds, you say? So if we happened to know that you're lying to us, that would make you not just a criminal, but a blasphemer too? And do you know of the punishment for blaspheming against Him?"

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorun yaralarına mı? O hâlde bize yalan söylediğinizi biliyor olsak bu sizi hem suçlu hem de günahkâr yapmayacak mı? Günahkârlığın cezasını bilir misiniz?"
